commitments.commitment: Snipe competition scheduled for Thursday/Friday where participants need to buy exactly 30,000 PepERG
commitments.quote: we've got something coming up this Thursday, Friday. We call it a snipe competition, where you have to buy a very specific amount of PepERG from MewFinance or any other DEX alternative, and it's got to be exactly 30,000 PepERG on the nose

commitments.commitment: 400 ERG prize pool for next competition
commitments.quote: We've got a 400 ERG prize pool for our next comp, which is in ERG
